title: Cloudpay Finance
description: Cloudpay is a solution built for business to manage their payments. It's aimed to automate payments and finances enabling business to focus on growth.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/cloudpay/dashboard.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="User dashboard that lets you have a quick overview of your business"
/>


<Image
  src="/projects/cloudpay/schedule.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Business can schedule transactions."
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/cloudpay/transactions.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Here is how your transactions are listed"
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/cloudpay/profile.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="A profile overview with sub-menus to maximize on functionality"
/>

title: Food delivery app design
description: Experience the convenience of a seamless food delivery app designed for your cravings. From a sleek and intuitive interface to a swift order processing.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/fooddelivery/onboard.png"

  height={1691}
  caption="Seamless design from splash screen to on-boarding"
/>

  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Home page and search results"
/>

  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Items checkout, profile view, order success and custom network error"
/>

title: Pesabook
description: Track your income and expenses, create beautiful invoices, track your inventory, accept and make payments, and make accounting easyall in one place.

  src="/projects/pesabook/image.png"

  height={1691}
  caption="Sign up screen"
